context.flawed_solution:
#### 35
The canvases cost $40 and she spent half that amount on paint so she spent 40/2 = $<<40/2=20>>20 on paint
She spent $40.00 on canvases and $15.00 on an easel so she spent 40+15 = $<<40+15=55>>55.00
